name: MKPlacemark
desc: A user-friendly description of a location on the map.

items.name: init(coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a placemark object using the specified coordinate.

items.name: init(coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D, postalAddress: CNPostalAddress)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a placemark object with the specified coordinate and postal address from the user's Contacts database.

items.name: init(coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D, addressDictionary: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a placemark object using the specified coordinate and Address Book dictionary.

items.name: var countryCode: String?
items.desc: The abbreviated country or region name.
